ygData.subject: Re: Jewelry with LightStones?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just use illusion: dark elf before you kill it...hehe Skara ... From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@namsko.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 4:14 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Just use illusion: dark elf before you kill it...hehe
Skara

Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Jewelry with LightStones?


From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>

what if i refuse to kill wisps because i am an elf? heheh
hmmm perhaps this will give those of you who are not elves a way to sell
things to elves :)
but, if i kill a wisp, its bad.
